item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Well, that’s embarrassing for you.

Also, he just pmed me the source code I made for project rainbow… lolwut.

[quote="the king erik"]<!DOCTYPE  html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<title>Project Rainbow | Home</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/social-icons.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery-1.5.1.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery-ui-1.8.13.custom.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/easing.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery.scrollTo-1.4.2-min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery.cycle.all.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/custom.js"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.isotope.min.js"></script>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/nivo-slider.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />
		<script src="js/nivo-slider/jquery.nivo.slider.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/tabs.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/tabs.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/prettyPhoto/js/jquery.prettyPhoto.js"></script>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="js/prettyPhoto/css/prettyPhoto.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />
		<link rel="stylesheet" media="screen" href="css/superfish.css" /> 
		<link rel="stylesheet" media="screen" href="css/superfish-left.css" />
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/superfish-1.4.8/js/hoverIntent.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/superfish-1.4.8/js/superfish.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/superfish-1.4.8/js/supersubs.js"></script>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="js/poshytip-1.0/src/tip-twitter/tip-twitter.css" type="text/css" />
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="js/poshytip-1.0/src/tip-yellowsimple/tip-yellowsimple.css" type="text/css" />
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/poshytip-1.0/src/jquery.poshytip.min.js"></script>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/jquery.tweet.css" media="all"  type="text/css"/> 
		<script src="js/tweet/jquery.tweet.js" type="text/javascript"></script> 
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="js/jquery.fancybox-1.3.4/fancybox/jquery.fancybox-1.3.4.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />
		<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery.fancybox-1.3.4/fancybox/jquery.fancybox-1.3.4.pack.js"></script>		
		

	</head>
	<body class="home">
			<div id="header">
				<div class="wrapper">
					<a href="index.html"><img id="logo" src="img/logo.png" width="500" height="90" alt="Project Rainbow" /></a>
					<div class="top-search">
						<form  method="get" id="searchform" action="#">
							<div>
								<input type="text" value="Search..." name="s" id="s" onfocus="defaultInput(this)" onblur="clearInput(this)" />
								<input type="submit" id="searchsubmit" value=" " />
							</div>
						</form>
					</div>
				</div>				
			</div>
			
			<div id="menu">	
				<div id="menu-holder">
					<div class="wrapper">
						<ul id="nav" class="sf-menu">
							<li class="current-menu-item"><a href="index.html">Home<span class="subheader">Welcome</span></a></li>
							<li><a href="#">Server Options<span class="subheader">Options concerning server activity</span></a>
								<ul>
									<li><a href="/webby.php"><span> Play Now</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="http://up.ht/rN7WAR"><span> Download Client</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="/vote.php"><span> Vote</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="/donate/"><span> Donate</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="/rules/"><span> Rules</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="/highscores/"><span> Highscores</span></a></li>
								</ul>
							</li>
							<li><a href="#">Your Account<span class="subheader">Manage your account</span></a>
								<ul>
									<li><a href="/login.php"><span> Login</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="/register.php"><span> Register</span></a></li>
								</ul>
							</li>
							<li><a href="/projects">Side Projects <span class="subheader">Smaller Projects</span></a></li>
							<li><a href="/smf">Community<span class="subheader">Join in the conversation</span></a>
								<ul>
									<li><a href="/smf"><span> Forums</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="/faq"><span> FAQ's </span></a></li>
									<li><a href="/portal.php"><span> Message Center </span></a></li>
									<li><a href="#"><span> Members </span></a></li>
								</ul>
							</li>
							<li><a href="#">Other Info<span class="subheader">Other Information</span></a>
								<ul>
									<li><a href="/statuschecker"><span> Server Status Checker</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="potm"><span> Player Of The Month</span></a></li>
									<li><a href="#"><span> Affiliates</span></a></li>
								</ul>
							</li>
						</ul>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

			<div id="main">

				<div class="wrapper">

					<div class="clear"></div>
					<div id="headline">
						<span class="main">Project Rainbow</span>
						<span class="sub">Project Rainbow is currently <font color="green">online!</font color> Play now with __ other players!
						<a href="#" id="link" class="link-button-big"><span>Play Now!</span></a> 
					</div>
					<div id="content">

							<ul class="tabs">
								<li><a href="#"><span>Important Info</span></a></li>
								<li><a href="#"><span>Server Background</span></a></li>
								<li><a href="#"><span>Vote4Points</span></a></li>
								<li><a href="#"><span>Register & Login</span></a></li>
								<li><a href="#"><span>Rules & Regulations</span></a></li>
								<li><a href="#"><span>Member List</span></a></li>
								<li><a href="#"><span>Basic Helpcenter</span></a></li>
								<li><a href="#"><span>Edit My Profile</span></a></li>

							</ul>
							
							<div class="panes">
							
								<div>
									<ul class="blocks-thumbs thumbs-rollover">
										<li>
											<a href="#" class="thumb" title="New Website"><img src="img/newsite.png" alt="some image" height="150" width="263" /></a>
											<div class="excerpt">
												<a href="#" class="header">Latest Update</a>
We recently launched our brand new site, with all new features! We now have use of the login system we use and we have automatic donations!
											</div>
											<a href="#" class="link-button"><span>Read more →</span></a>
										</li>
										<li>
											<a href="#" class="thumb" title="Ruby, Website Developer"><img src="img/ruby.PNG" alt="some image" height="150" width="263" /></a>
											<div class="excerpt">
												<a href="#" class="header">Latest News</a>
We recently hired a new developer who specialises in websites, welcome Ruby to Project Rainbow! It's thanks to him we have all these cool new features!
											</div>
											<a href="#" class="link-button"><span>Read more →</span></a>
										</li>
										<li>
											<a href="#" class="thumb" title="Staff Member Of The Month"><img src="img/staffofthemonth.png" alt="some image" height="150" width="263" /></a>
											<div class="excerpt">
												<a href="#" class="header">Staff Member Of The Month</a>
												
This is another new feature thought up by Ruby, this will hopefully rope in more players to the website, click the button below and vote for your favourite PR staff member!
											</div>
											<a href="#" class="link-button"><span>Read more →</span></a>
										</li>
									</ul>
								</div>
									<div class="plain-text">
										<h6>What is Project Rainbow?</h6> 
										<p> Server history</p>
										<p> Community history</p>
										<a href="#" class="link-button"><span>Read more →</span></a>
									</div>
									<div class="votepoints">
<p>
Hello World!
</p>
									</div>
									
									<div class="login">
<p>
<center>
<form id='login' action='login.php' method='post' accept-charset='UTF-8'>
<fieldset >
<p>
Needing to register? Register quickly below, it's free!<br />

<form id='register' action='register.php' method='post'
    accept-charset='UTF-8'>
<fieldset >
<input type='hidden' name='submitted' id='submitted' value='1'/>
<label for='name' >Your Name: </label>
<input type='text' name='name' id='name' maxlength="50" /><br />
<label for='email' >Email Address:</label>.
<input type='text' name='email' id='email' maxlength="50" /><br />
<label for='username' >Username:</label>
<input type='text' name='username' id='username' maxlength="50" /><br />
<label for='password' >Password:</label>
<input type='password' name='password' id='password' maxlength="50" /><br />
<input type='submit' name='Submit' value='Register' />
</fieldset>
</form>
</p>
<p>
Already have an account here at Project Rainbow? Login now!
</p>
<input type='hidden' name='submitted' id='submitted' value='1'/>
<label for='username' >Username*:</label>
<input type='text' name='username' id='username'  maxlength="50" /><br />
<label for='password' >Password*:</label>
<input type='password' name='password' id='password' maxlength="50" /><br />
<input type='submit' name='Submit' value='Login' />
</fieldset>
</form>
</center>
</p>
									</div>

									<div class="onlinestatus">
<p>
<center><b>General Rules</b></center>
<br />
1. Respect all players as well as staff members. Do not abuse chat.<br />
<br />
2. Do not flame. This can include excessive use of explicitives, verbal threats, ect.<br />
<br />
3. Do not spam. Begging and advertising are also covered in these rules.<br />
<br />
4  Listen to all staff members. If you suspect abuse, post on forums instead of typing at them.<br />
<br />
5. Report all bugs and glitches to owners. Do not abuse.<br />
<br />
6. Do not encourage others to break the rules.<br />
<br />
7. Do not sell anything ingame for RSGP/Real Life $$$. All accounts are property of Project Rainbow.<br />
<br />
8. Do not evade punishments.<br />
<br />
9. Do not make a huge fuss about punishments. Any complaining will immediately lead to bigger punishments.<br />
<br />
10. All bans must be appealed through the Appeals system.<br />
<br />
11. Any punishment given without a fair trial will be immediately reversed, with no charges allowed.<br />
<br />
12. Publicizing quitting will result in a ban of your account.<br />
<br />
13. Scamming others is legal. If you fall for it, it's your fault.<br />
<br />
14. If you abuse reputation (or rep++ someone multiple times), your bank will be wiped.<br />
<br />
15. Not reporting rule breakers counts as an offense.<br />
<br />
<br />
<b><center>Forum Rules</b></center>
<br /><br />
1. Limit foul language.<br />
<br />
2. Don't spam<br />
<br />
3. Don't grave-dig. (posting when a topic is more than two weeks old)<br />
<br />
4. Do not post offensive or inappropriate material.<br />
<br />
5. Post in the right section.<br />
<br />
6. Do not create threads with the sole purpose of discrediting another player (libel) <br />
<br />
7. Use common sense when posting. If you have nothing to contribute, then don't.<br />
<br />
8. Use proper grammar to your best extent<br />
<br />
9. Have a proper title that is related to the topic. Remember, Titles are used to give a quick preview of your topic, not gather attention<br />
<br />
10. Do not disrupt the harmony of the forums. Freedom of speech is always supported, but will be abridged if it infringes upon the rights of others. Try private messaging if you have a serious complaint.<br />
<br />
11. Have fun and be dedicated! We enjoy players that have fun.<br />
<br />
<br />
<center>
<b>PK Rules</b>
</center>
<br />
<br /> 
  <i>Zen Rules</i>
<br />
<br />
1. No Pilejumping. Just wait until they are finished, and If they recieve a Pk Drop, allow them to collect it before you attack.<br />
<br />
2. Do not use staff commands to gain an unfair advantage. Such as turning invisible, flying, infinite hp, pnpc, teleporting to people, or teleporting people to you.<br />
<br />
<br />
   <i>Unsafepk Rules</i>
<br />
<br />
1. Pilejumping is not allowed. Killing someone after they kill someone is though. Just no 3-way combatants.<br />
<br />
2. Anyone with special staff priviledges are not allowed to go to unsafepk.<br />
<br />
3. Do not abuse the system to gain free pk points.<br />
<br />

Punishments for breaking major rules will usually be more harsh for unsafepk than for zen because you lose your items at unsafepk.<br />

<br />
<center>
<br />
<b>Staff Rules</b></center>
<br />
<br />
1. Do not abuse priviledges. They will be taken away if you do. This is inclusive of banning without reason, using your immunities in a malicious way, and abusing spawning and trading priviledges.
<br /><br />
2. Do not issue punishments without creating a Court Room case, where the case can be discussed. (No punishment without due process)
<br /><br />
3. Do not relieve a player of his personal property, unless a case is made on the reason for it.
<br /><br />
4. Absolutely NEVER disrupt a players' game experience. This means: No abuse of the ::message or ::vent commands, no ::xteletome without saying the reason, ect. Most are fine about this, but some are ruining the experience for all.
<br /><br />
5. Never argue with another staff member publically. This is unprofessional, and should never occur.
<br /><br />
6. Do NOT believe your are impervious. If a 66%, or 2/3 majority of the players bind together and create a petition demanding your impeachment, you will be impeached.
   *Process will lead to a 2-week period without staff, and which after, the staff member can reapply to become staff. If a 2/3 majoriy says yes, they may stay.
<br /><br />
7. Do not use ban as a tool to intimidate players to follow you. Recent threads in the staff hangout, talking about how players are out of control, and need to be curbed, are perfect examples of how staff are treating players.
<br /><br />
8. For forum staff, Do not edit posts ever. As an obstruction of free speech, this should never be done.
<br /><br />
10. Only administrators may edit the rules.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
</p>
</html>
									</div>

									<div class="memberlist">
<html>
<p>
LALALA
</p>
</html>
									</div>

									<div class="smallhelpcenter">
<html>
<p>
I'm the best webdeveloper ever.
</p>
</html>
									</div>

									<div class="editmyprofile">
<html>
<p>
This is where I edit my profile.
</p>
</html>
									</div>
								</div>
								<!-- ENDS Information -->
<html>
			<div id="footer">

				<div class="wrapper">

					<ul id="footer-cols">
						<li class="col">
							<h6>Useful Links</h6>
							<ul>
								<li class="page_item"><a href="#">Staff List</a></li>
								<li class="page_item"><a href="#">In-Game Guides & Walkthroughs</a></li>
								<li class="page_item"><a href="#">Status Checker</a></li>
								<li class="page_item"><a href="#">Programming Tutorials</a></li>
								<li class="page_item"><a href="#">FAQ's</a></li>
								<li class="page_item"><a href="#">Report Abuse</a></li>
								<li class="page_item"><a href="#">Appeal Your Punishment</a></li>
								<li class="page_item"> <a href="#">My Account</a></li>
								<li class="page_item"><a href="#">Terms Of Service</a></li>
							</ul>
						</li>
						
						<li class="col">
							<h6>Archives</h6>
							<ul>
								<li><a href="#">Drop List</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Item List</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Beginner Guide</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Skilling Guide</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Commands List</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Super Rare List</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Price Guide</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">MineCraft Mod Guide</a></li>
								<li><a href="#">Barrows Guide</a></li>
							</ul>
						</li>
						<li class="col">
							<h6>Why should I join Project Rainbow?</h6>
You should join Project Rainbow(PR) because it is truly one of a kind. There are no other servers in the world with over 700 custom items. We're not just a server, we're a programming community. We have users who are java gurus, we have the best Developers in the RSPS world. Our staff team and development team are dedicated and work tirelessly for hours every day to make PR the number one Delta server on google! We are the server for you, come give us a visit!
						</li>
						
					</ul>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div id="bottom">
				<!-- wrapper-bottom -->
				<div class="wrapper">
					<div id="bottom-text">© Project Rainbow 2012 | Site template by<a href="http://www.prothieum.org"> Ruby </a>| By entering the site you are agreeing to our privacy policy.</a> </div>
					<!-- Social -->
					<ul class="social ">
						<li><a href="http://www.facebook.com" class="poshytip  facebook" title="Become a fan"></a></li>
						<li><a href="http://www.twitter.com" class="poshytip twitter" title="Follow our tweets"></a></li>
						<li><a href="http://www.dribbble.com" class="poshytip dribbble" title="View our work"></a></li>
						<li><a href="http://www.addthis.com" class="poshytip addthis" title="Tell everybody"></a></li>
						<li><a href="http://www.vimeo.com" class="poshytip vimeo" title="View our videos"></a></li>
						<li><a href="http://www.youtube.com" class="poshytip youtube" title="View our videos"></a></li>
					</ul>
					<!-- ENDS Social -->
					<div id="to-top" class="poshytip" title="To top"></div>
				</div>
				<!-- ENDS wrapper-bottom -->
			</div>
	</body>
</html>[/quote]
